meshIneBits

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • meshIneBits.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A model is the full set of triangle of the existing 3D project to pattern. Model is created from a STL file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model(java.lang.String filename)
      Read all the triangles of the STL file, whether it's an Ascii or a Binary STL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(java.lang.String filename)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Read all the triangles of the STL file, whether it's an Ascii or a Binary STL.
        Parameters:
        filename - The STL file path (File.toString()).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the file is not a STL.

    • Method Detail

      • center

        public void center()
        Find the centre of the project and translate triangle so the centre is the origin of the basis. To find the centre, it search the distance between maximum and minimum of X and Y and divide it by two. The centre is always placed at the lower Z.
